scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && tauri dev --config src-tauri/tauri.dev.conf.json
scripts.dev:dynamic: npm run cleanup && npm run dev:allocate && npm run dev
scripts.build: node scripts/inject-version.cjs && vite build && node scripts/patch-vendor.cjs
scripts.build:minified: npm run build && npm run minify:servers
scripts.tauri:dev: npm run cleanup && npm run ensure:server && concurrently -k "npm run dev:frontend" "tauri dev --no-dev-server --config src-tauri/tauri.dev.conf.json"
scripts.tauri:dev:mac: npm run cleanup && npm run build:server:macos && concurrently -k "npm run dev:frontend" "tauri dev --no-dev-server --config src-tauri/tauri.dev.conf.json"
scripts.tauri:dev:win: npm run cleanup && npm run build:server:windows && concurrently -k "npm run dev:frontend" "tauri dev --no-dev-server --config src-tauri/tauri.dev.conf.json"
scripts.tauri:dev:manual: npm run cleanup && tauri dev --no-dev-server --config src-tauri/tauri.dev.conf.json
scripts.tauri:build:mac:arm64: npm run build:unified:macos && npm run prepare:resources:macos && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.arm64.conf.json
scripts.tauri:build:mac:x64: npm run build:unified:macos && npm run prepare:resources:macos && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.x64.conf.json
scripts.tauri:build:mac:release: npm run prepare:resources:macos && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.arm64.conf.json
scripts.tauri:build:mac:release:x64: npm run prepare:resources:macos && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --config src-tauri/tauri.x64.conf.json
scripts.tauri:build:win: npm run build:unified:windows && npm run prepare:resources:windows && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.tauri:build:linux: npm run build:unified:linux && npm run prepare:resources:linux && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:yume-cli:binary:macos: cd src-yume-cli && npx pkg dist-bundle/yume-cli.cjs --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output ../src-tauri/resources/yume-cli-macos-arm64 && npx pkg dist-bundle/yume-cli.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ../src-tauri/resources/yume-cli-macos-x64
scripts.build:yume-cli:binary:win: cd src-yume-cli && npx pkg dist-bundle/yume-cli.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output ../src-tauri/resources/yume-cli-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:yume-cli:binary:linux: cd src-yume-cli && npx pkg dist-bundle/yume-cli.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ../src-tauri/resources/yume-cli-linux-x64
scripts.build:yume-cli:binary:all: npm run build:yume-cli && npm run build:yume-cli:binary:macos && npm run build:yume-cli:binary:win && npm run build:yume-cli:binary:linux
